Description: You wrap your hands around the target and squeeze hard. Make a melee attack against a creature, dealing normal damage on a hit. If the target has 50% or more of its maximum HP, double your move modifier for the damage roll.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 5d6 at level 5, 4d12 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
